title: NYTimes Title Font
content:
Hi All

Can anyone tell me what font is used for the "80,000 Jobs lost..." title?

THANKS!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045103im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NYT-MLK_3793.jpg)
author: user_1969

comments.content: The Times uses a custom version of [Cheltenham](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045103/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Cheltenham) designed by [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045103/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%20Carter).

Your best match is probably [URW Cheltenham Bold Extra Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045103/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/urw/cheltenham_bold_extra_condensed_ot_std/?sample_text=80%2C000%20JOBS%20LOST%3B%20DEMOCRATS%20URGE%20NEW%20AID%20PACKAGE&sample_size=24) or [Font Bureau's Cheltenham Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017045103/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/cheltenham_bold_condensed/?sample_text=80%2C000%20JOBS%20LOST%3B%20DEMOCRATS%20URGE%20NEW%20AID%20PACKAGE&sample_size=24).
